result.name: Association between miR-365 Polymorphism and Ischemic Stroke in a Chinese Population
result.description: This study aimed to examine the relationship between miR-365 SNPs and the risk of IS. The study recruited 215 IS patients and 220 controls. The SNPscan genotyping was employed to genotype three polymorphic loci (rs121224, rs30230, and rs178553) of miR-365.
